creator: ash@huntwork.net
text:
IINC isn't wide unless the index is > MAX_SHORT or increment is > Byte.MAX_BYTE.
 but the jvm spec says that for non-wide iinc, index is an unsigned byte.  the
attached patch fixes my problem.

Created attachment 10153
make iinc's wide when index > MAX_BYTE
creator: ash@huntwork.net

text:
could someone please take a look at this?  A fix is included, and i have a
SandMark bug that requires this fix.  Thanks!
creator: ash@huntwork.net
